title: Did Australia Plan to Kill Millions of Feral Cats Using Poisoned Sausages?
subtitle: An April 2019 New York Times feature article revived interest in the Australian government's years-old Threatened Species Strategy.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The Australian government's Threatened Species Strategy has as one of its aims the culling of 2 million feral cats by 2020, largely using a sausage bait carrying a lethal toxin.
